source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SEQ_00<tab>Sophie is beginning to wonder if Radovan will ever return.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SEQ_00<tab>聖バルロアイアン広場のソフィーは、ご立腹のようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SEQ_01<tab>Following Radovan's disappearance, you and Sophie have decided to wait for him to make his way back to Ishgard of his own accord. Thankfully, the danger that faced Cato Mammula appears to have passed, as the Alaudae have not been seen since, although the defector from Garlemald remains in hiding. Meanwhile, Sophie has grown restless, so she suggests asking the Temple Knights if they have any assignments to keep her occupied.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SEQ_01<tab>ソフィーによると、去ったラドヴァンはまだ戻ってないようだ。彼女とふたりで新たな仕事を探すことになった。イシュガルドの清貧の凱旋門にいる「ソフィー」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SEQ_02<tab>In the time it has taken you to arrive, Sophie has already spoken to the Temple Knights regarding work for bodyguards, even going so far as accepting an assignment. An anonymous client is waiting for you in a remote part of western Coerthas, though you will have to meet them in person to learn what the job entails.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SEQ_02<tab>ソフィーと話し、護衛の依頼を受けた。クルザス西部高地のツインプールズで「依頼人の男」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SEQ_03<tab>You are soon made to regret meeting the mysterious client in the middle of nowhere when it turns out to be a trap laid by the leader of the Alaudae, Vitus quo Messalla. He has abandoned his mission to assassinate Cato Mammula for a greater prize: your head. The former pilus prior seeks to curry favor with the Emperor by killing the bane of Garlemald and thereby reclaim his place among the elite. Vitus's magitek restraints have rendered you and Sophie utterly defenseless, and when he charges to deliver the killing blow, you are only saved at the last moment by the surprise arrival of Radovan, who parries with his gunblade before freeing you. When the Alaudae are ordered to attack, Radovan produces a small device supplied by Cato Mammula and uses it to activate the magitek collars fitted to the prisoners turned soldiers, temporarily paralyzing them. Vitus responds by slaying his own men, and prepares to face the three of you alone. Despite being outnumbered, the master of the Garlean gunblade pushes your party to the brink of defeat, and after Radovan and Sophie exhaust their aether reserves to create a life-saving barrier, you are finally able to best Vitus in single combat.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SEQ_03<tab>依頼人の男と話したところ、その正体はアラウダエの隊長、ヴィトゥス・クォ・メッサラだった。冒険者とソフィーは罠にはめられるが、間一髪でラドヴァンに救われる。3人でヴィトゥスと激戦を繰り広げ、勝利するのだった。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SEQ_04<tab>After a hard-fought battle, Radovan reveals that ever since his departure during your last assignment he had been tracking the Alaudae. Once he had discovered that they were pursuing you, the Warrior of Light, Radovan sought out their original target, Cato Mammula, and asked him to create a device that could activate the magitek collars. The two seem to have put aside their differences and reached an understanding, a stark contrast to the incident in which Radovan threatened to kill Mammula. Your mentor reveals that he never had any intention of physically harming the engineer, but went too far in his intimidation. However, it was at that moment he noticed the Alaudae were watching from afar and seized the opportunity to give the impression he had parted ways with you and Sophie. He remained out of sight but close by, monitoring their movements and discovering Vitus's plan to lure you into a trap. Now that the Alaudae have been eliminated, you return to Ishgard to share the day's events with Mammula, whose life is no longer in danger.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SEQ_04<tab>ラドヴァンはひとりでアラウダエを探り、その狙いが冒険者だと知って、ずっと対策を講じていたという。アラウダエを壊滅させた朗報を届けるため、聖バルロアイアン広場で「カト・マムラ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SEQ_05<tab>Cato is delighted to hear that he can now begin work on the ceruleum heating system he has promised to build with Garlond Ironworks, and offers his gratitude to the party, including Radovan. Now that the mission can be considered a success, Radovan acknowledges that the time for you to accompany him and Sophie on bodyguard assignments is over. While they are grateful for all you have done, they recognize that there are others who would benefit from your strength and guidance. However, they wish to make one more journey with you─this time to Revenant's Toll, where Radovan hopes to find others with whom to share the art of the gunblade.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SEQ_05<tab>カト・マムラに朗報を届けた。ラドヴァンは冒険者を護衛稼業に巻き込むのを終えるという。冒険者は彼らをモードゥナに案内した。モードゥナのレヴナンツトールで「ラドヴァン」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SEQ_06<tab>Radovan and Sophie are pleased by the warm and lively atmosphere of Revenant's Toll, and are eager to settle into their new surroundings. With the vast number of adventurers passing through its gates, this seems like the ideal place for Radovan to find candidates to be trained as gunbreakers. Having proven yourself a worthy successor to the legacy of his clan, Radovan bids you farewell as you set out to follow your own path, gunblade at the ready.

※The next gunbreaker quest will be available from Radovan once you have met the following requirements:
※ You must have completed the main scenario quest “Shadowbringers.”
※ You must have completed the role quest “To Have Loved and Lost.”
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SEQ_06<tab>ラドヴァンと話し、ガンブレイカーの使命を託された。これからも、ガンブレイカーの技に磨きをかけ、誰かを護ることに努めていこう。

※以下の条件を満たすと、レヴナンツトールのラドヴァンから、新たなジョブクエストを受注することができます。
1「メインクエスト：漆黒のヴィランズ」の、
　「漆黒のヴィランズ」を完了する。
2.TANKロールの「ロールクエスト」を完了する。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Sophie.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_TODO_00<tab>ソフィーと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the prospective client in Twinpools.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_TODO_01<tab>ツインプールズの依頼人の男と話す

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the prospective client in Twinpools.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Cato Mammula in Ishgard.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_TODO_03<tab>イシュガルドのカト・マムラと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Radovan in Revenant's Toll.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SOPHIE_000_000<tab>For better or worse, the Alaudae are nowhere to be seen. Reese and the others seem to think they've abandoned their mission and gone back to Garlemald, which I highly doubt. For them, failure simply isn't an option.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SOPHIE_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。
あれから、めっきりアラウダエは姿を見せていない。
彼らは暗殺を断念し、本国に帰ったというのが、大方の予想なの。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SOPHIE_000_001<tab>But what I want to know is, where is Radovan!? I've a good mind to pack up and leave him here! Or at least, find somewhere warmer to wait for him.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SOPHIE_000_001<tab>それよりも、未だにオッサンが戻ってこないんだ……。
いったい、どこをほっつき歩いてんだか、あのポンコツ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SOPHIE_000_002<tab>If there's one thing I can't bear, it's standing about doing nothing, especially somewhere as bitterly cold as this. I know─let's go and ask the Temple Knights if they have any work for us!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SOPHIE_000_002<tab>こうなったら、オッサンは放っといて、
アタシたちだけで、次の仕事を始めちゃおう。
神殿騎士団リーヴで、護衛の依頼を探しにいこうよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SOPHIE_000_010<tab>What took you so long? I've already been and spoken to them. Anyway, there's a client looking for protection, but they wish to remain anonymous.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SOPHIE_000_010<tab>ちょうど、入ったばかりの護衛の依頼があったよ！
依頼人はよっぽど警戒しているらしく、
匿名を希望しているんだってさ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SOPHIE_000_011<tab>We're supposed to meet them in a place called Twinpools, which is in western Coerthas, apparently.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SOPHIE_000_011<tab>待ち合わせ場所も、街の外を指定していて、
クルザス西部高地の、ツインプールズに来てほしいみたい……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SOPHIE_000_012<tab>Seeing as we have nothing better to do, we may as well go and find out what they want. It should pass the time until Radovan comes back, if nothing else!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SOPHIE_000_012<tab>なんだか、大きな仕事の予感がしない？
さっそく、「ツインプールズ」に向かおう！
オッサンがいない間に、アタシたちで大仕事を成してやるんだ……！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_000_080<tab>(-Prospective Client-)My prayers have been answered! I was beginning to think the Temple Knights had forgotten about me.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_000_080<tab>(-依頼人の男-)あなたが、噂の凄腕の護衛ですか。
さすがにお強そうだ……頼もしいですね。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_000_081<tab>(-Prospective Client-)I do hope you will forgive my need for secrecy. The nature of my request is very sensitive, you see. Now, if you would be so kind as to follow me.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_000_081<tab>(-依頼人の男-)それでは、護ってほしい者を紹介しますので、
どうぞこちらへ……

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SOPHIE_000_082<tab>Ungh! I can't...break free!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SOPHIE_000_082<tab>な、なにこれっ……？
動けない……！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_000_083<tab>(-Prospective Client-)Wriggle all you want, little fly. Nothing escapes my web.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_000_083<tab>(-依頼人の男-)君たちの足元には、魔導拘束器を隠していた。
ガレマール帝国の監獄で、凶暴な囚人を拘束するためのものだ。
どんな強者でも、まず動くことはできないだろう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_000_084<tab>Ah, but 'twould be a shame for you to die without knowing the name of the spider who ensnared you. I am Vitus quo Messalla, commander of the Alaudae.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_000_084<tab>紹介が遅れたね、私が懲罰部隊「アラウダエ」の隊長、
ヴィトゥス・クォ・メッサラだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_000_085<tab>When we came to collect that old goat who had strayed from the herd, I never expected to find a prowling lion. Or should I say “Warrior of Light”?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_000_085<tab>知ってのとおり、我々はカトの暗殺依頼を受けていたのだが、
そんなつまらない仕事はもうやめたんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_000_086<tab>There are many in Garlemald who would be delighted were I to present your corse. And I doubt that restoring me to pilus prior will suffice. No, legatus would be far more fitting. “Vitus van Messalla” has such a wonderful ring to it...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_000_086<tab>名を挙げて、また千人隊長に復帰するには、
エオルゼアの英雄、君を殺すことが一番なもんでね……。
いや、それどころか軍団長たる「ヴァン」階級さえ夢じゃない！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_000_087<tab>Yes... So close I can almost taste it. Your tale ends here!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_000_087<tab>その夢のため……
さっそくだが、死んでもらおう！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SOPHIE_000_088<tab>Radovan! Where the bloody hells have you been!?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SOPHIE_000_088<tab>オッサン！
いままで何やってたんだよ！？

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_089<tab>Tracking the Alaudae. That's how I knew they'd come after you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_089<tab>すまなかった。
あれから、こいつらを倒すため、いろいろと探っていたのだ。
そして狙いが君だと知った……！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_000_090<tab>Prisoner 1441, if I am not mistaken. First, you refuse my kind offer, then you have the audacity to escape. And now this. Whatever I am to do with you?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_000_090<tab>おやおや、囚人番号1441番じゃないか。
私の誘いを断ったあげく、脱獄までするなんて……
君は本当に困った犬……いや、猫だな？

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_091<tab>You're not the only one with a few tricks up his sleeve, Vitus.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_091<tab>ヴィトゥスよ。
用意周到なお前に倣って、私も準備してきた物がある。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_092<tab>When we first encountered the Alaudae, I noticed the collars they were wearing. I had one myself not so long ago. This must be your way of “maintaining discipline.”
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_092<tab>以前、戦ったとき、隊員たちの首に、かつて私も苦しめられた、
魔導仕掛けの「首輪」が着けられていることに気づいたのだ。
恐らく、囚人である彼らの反乱や脱走を防ぐためだろう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_093<tab>I took one of them to Mammula, who engineered a device similar to yours. How ironic that the very collars you are so fond of could be turned against you.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_093<tab>だから、魔導技師であるカトに頼んで、
作動させるための発信機を製作してもらったのさ。
部下を犬のように扱ったことが、仇となったな……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_000_094<tab>Worthless dogs.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_000_094<tab>しょせん、犬は犬……
使えなくなったら、処分される運命だ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_000_095<tab>Of course, I never needed the Alaudae or those magitek traps to slay the likes of you. But I prefer to leave nothing to chance.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_000_095<tab>勘違いするな、拘束器や部下に頼らなくとも、
私にとって君たちを始末することなど造作もない。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_000_096<tab>No matter. We will just have to settle this the old-fashioned way. Speaking of which, where did you find those...antiques?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_000_096<tab>獅子は兎を捕らえるにも全力を尽くすという。
私も英雄を殺すために、最善を尽くしたまでのこと。
だが、こうなれば、真っ向から挑むほかないようだ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_000_097<tab>If you think they can compare to a Garlean gunblade, you are wrong. Very wrong...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_000_097<tab>そんなオモチャとは違う、
本物のガンブレードの技を、とくと味わわせてやろう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_098<tab>As much as I wish to fight him alone, there is more at stake here than my pride. We must rid the world of this beast, once and for all!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_098<tab>私がエオルゼアの英雄をお護りしよう。
と、言いたいところだが、奴の実力は本物。
ひとりになったとて、私だけでは勝てぬだろう……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_099<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Sophie! Follow my lead!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_099<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、ソフィーよ、
共闘を頼む！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>Defeat Vitus quo Messalla!
target: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>ヴィトゥス・クォ・メッサラを倒せ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_QIB_001_TODO_2<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_QIB_001_TODO_2<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_BATTLETALK_000_001<tab>Do hold still while I take your head, little lion. I would make a present of it to the Emperor himself!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_BATTLETALK_000_001<tab>ククク、君の首を帝国に持ち帰って、
私は軍団長へと登りつめるのだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_BATTLETALK_000_002<tab>As for your friends, I am more than happy to hack them to pieces!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_BATTLETALK_000_002<tab>我が愛用の大型ガンブレード、
「メルクリウス」の餌食となるがいい！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_003<tab>When I told you he rivals Gaius van Baelsar, that was no exaggeration! Watch out, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. It's you he's after!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_003<tab>奴の力は尋常じゃない。
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、ここは慎重にいくぞ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_BATTLETALK_000_004<tab>You savages could never hope to master a technique such as this!
target: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_BATTLETALK_000_004<tab>これで吹っ飛ぶがいい、「衝撃斬」！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_BATTLETALK_000_101<tab>Impudent wretches! How dare you keep me from my prize!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_BATTLETALK_000_101<tab>なかなか、楽しませてくれる……。
これでもっと面白くなるぞ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_102<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_102<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_103<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_103<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_BATTLETALK_000_104<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_BATTLETALK_000_104<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_BATTLETALK_000_105<tab>I should have known the Warrior of Light would not fall so easily.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_BATTLETALK_000_105<tab>さすがは、エオルゼアの英雄といったところか。
この程度では倒れぬようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_106<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_106<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_107<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_107<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_108<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_108<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_109<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_109<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_110<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_110<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_100_111<tab>He's after Sophie! Stop him!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_100_111<tab>まずい、ソフィーを狙っているようだぞ！
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>も来てくれ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_BATTLETALK_000_201<tab>I have enjoyed our little game, but the time has come to end it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_BATTLETALK_000_201<tab>よくやった、君たちの力は想像以上だったよ。
しかし……これでもう終わりにしよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_202<tab>This...does not look good.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_202<tab>これは……！
奴がとてつもない技を放ってくるぞ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_203<tab>Sophie! Help me form a barrier!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_203<tab>障壁を展開する！
ソフィー、援護を頼む！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SOPHIE_BATTLETALK_000_204<tab>Understood!
target: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SOPHIE_BATTLETALK_000_204<tab>任せてちょうだい！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_205<tab>We made it... But that took everything we had.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_205<tab>ハァ、ハァ……
すまない、魔力を使い切ってしまったようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_BATTLETALK_000_206<tab>All spent, little flies? Now, Warrior of Light, there is no one left to save you!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_BATTLETALK_000_206<tab>信じられん、我が奥義を耐えしのいだだと？
これがガンブレイカーの技だというのか……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_207<tab>It's up to you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Show him the true strength of a gunbreaker!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_207<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、まだ闘えるか？
奴に、真のガンブレイカーの力を思い知らせてくれ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_BATTLETALK_000_208<tab>You have defied me long enough!
target: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_BATTLETALK_000_208<tab>ウォォォォォォォォッッッ！！！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SOPHIE_BATTLETALK_000_209<tab>I...will do what I can...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SOPHIE_BATTLETALK_000_209<tab>ご、ごめんなさい、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。
せめて、最後の魔力でキミを……！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_BATTLETALK_000_301<tab>Finally, we are alone! Let us fight, steel against steel.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_BATTLETALK_000_301<tab>フン、くだらん。
君ひとりとなったいま、さっさと片付けてくれるわ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_BATTLETALK_000_302<tab>Impressive, but no match for Garlean magitek. Have at you!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_BATTLETALK_000_302<tab>チッ、しぶとい奴だ。
これを使うはめになるとはな……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_BATTLETALK_000_303<tab>So stubborn... Why do you deny your true purpose?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_BATTLETALK_000_303<tab>クソッ、この蛮族めが！
私は貴様の首をとって軍団長になるのだ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_BATTLETALK_000_304<tab>You exist only to further my legacy! Now die!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_BATTLETALK_000_304<tab>これで最後だ！
エオルゼアの英雄よ、私のために死ね……！！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_BATTLETALK_000_305<tab>Perhaps it is time to see death...from the other side.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_VITUSQUOMESSALLA_BATTLETALK_000_305<tab>こ、この私が……蛮族ごときに……
こんなこと……断じてあっては……ならんのだ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_100_100<tab>I never thought I'd live to see the day that Vitus quo Messalla met his match. You are a better gunbreaker than I ever was.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_100_100<tab>見事だった。
やはり、君こそ真のガンブレイカーだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_100<tab>And for what it's worth, I'm sorry for all the trouble I've put you both through.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_100<tab>これまで姿を消していたこと、
改めて謝ろう……すまなかった。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SOPHIE_000_101<tab>You're sorry!? I should bloody well hope so too, you great oaf! What were you thinking, threatening Mammula like that? Not to mention leaving us to escort him to Ishgard!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SOPHIE_000_101<tab>まったく、大事な護衛を投げだして、
いったい、いままで何をしてたっていうの……？

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_102<tab>When <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> found me and Mammula, I noticed the Alaudae watching us from a nearby cliff top.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_102<tab>実をいうと、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>が、
我が過ちを止めてくれた直後、私は崖の上に、
ヴィトゥスら、アラウダエがいることに気づいたのだ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_103<tab>I thought it was strange that they'd pass up the opportunity to attack us, so I made it appear as though I'd abandoned you and started following them in secret. I discovered that their primary target was now the Warrior of Light, not Cato Mammula.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_103<tab>だが、一向に襲ってくる様子のない彼らに疑問を持った。
そこで、私はアラウダエを泳がせることにした。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_104<tab>Their scouts saw you on the way to Camp Dragonhead and reported it to Vitus, who then called off the ambush to see for himself if the information was valid. Powerful as he was, he would never show his hand unless he was certain of victory, so he waited to make his move.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_104<tab>ひとり、離脱したように見せかけて、
彼らを尾行し、その動向を探ることにしたのだ。
そして、ヴィトゥスの標的が、君に変わったことを知った。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_105<tab>One thing I did know for certain is that even if the three of us fought together, we wouldn't stand a chance against the full might of the Alaudae. That was when I decided to consult our fugitive engineer.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_105<tab>しかし、ヴィトゥスと隊員たちの戦力を合わせれば、
こちらに勝ち目がないこともわかった。
そこで、カトに部下を無力化する発信機を作ってもらった。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_106<tab>We talked into the early hours of the morning until we reached an understanding, and he agreed to construct the magitek control device. In order for the plan to work, I would have to remain hidden until the very last moment, even from the two of you.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_106<tab>君たちに接触せず単独行動したのは、
慎重なヴィトゥスに、こちらの作戦を読ませないため。
発信機の完成に時間がかかったが、間一髪で間に合ってよかった。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SOPHIE_000_107<tab>But I thought you needed time alone to think about what you'd done?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SOPHIE_000_107<tab>なんだ……てっきり、自分の過ちに打ちひしがれて、
ひとりで落ち込んでるんだと思ってた……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_108<tab>The remorse I felt for dishonoring myself was no act. When I realized Mammula's identity, I wanted to confront him about Bozja, but I needed to get him away from you and Reese. I never had any intention of killing him. All I wanted was for him to admit to his crimes.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_108<tab>いや……正直それもある。
あんな間違いを犯してしまったのだ、
<var 08 E905 ((彼女)) ((彼)) /var>に合わせる顔もなかった……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_109<tab>But it still gave me a sick sense of satisfaction to see him on his knees, defeated. That is when I knew I'd betrayed the ideals of the gunbreaker, that I had abandoned my honor. I want to thank you for guiding me back to the true path.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_109<tab>だからこそ、なんとか挽回したかった。
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、私の過ちを正してくれて、
本当に感謝している、どうもありがとう……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_110<tab>With Vitus gone, any remaining members of the Alaudae are free of his control and are likely to be treated as fugitives running from the Empire. In any case, I think it is safe for Mammula to come out of hiding now.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_110<tab>これにて、アラウダエは壊滅した。
さあ、カトにこの朗報を伝えにいこう……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_115<tab>Though I may never forgive Mammula for what he has done, he strives to atone for his sins, as I do mine. It is not for me to judge him.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_115<tab>安心してくれ……。
このとおり、私はカトをもう恨んではいない。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SOPHIE_000_116<tab>For all his talk about honor, Radovan can be a right sneaky bastard when it suits him. I'll have to keep my eye on him!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SOPHIE_000_116<tab>今回はオッサンにしてやられたみたいで、
なんだか癪だな……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_CATONANMAMMULA_000_120<tab>Allow me to express my gratitude for vanquishing the Alaudae, which I understand was due in no small part to Radovan's marvelous idea involving the magitek collars. I am glad to hear the device I cobbled together functioned as intended.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_CATONANMAMMULA_000_120<tab>アラウダエを倒してくれて、ありがとうございます。
特殊な信号のため、発信機の製作に手間取りましたが、
間に合ったようで本当によかった。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_100_120<tab>Yes, we couldn't have done it without your help.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_100_120<tab>カト……。
こちらこそ、あなたのおかげで、
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>を助けることができた。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_200_120<tab>Vitus alone pushed the three of us to our limits. Had the Alaudae joined the fight, things would've ended very differently. We owe you our lives.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_200_120<tab>アラウダエの兵士どもまで相手にしていたら、
さすがに勝つことはできなかっただろう。
本当に感謝している、どうもありがとう……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_CATONANMAMMULA_100_121<tab>All things considered, it was the least I could do. A remarkably simple matter, in fact, compared to my next endeavor, the installation of Ishgard's ceruleum heating system.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_CATONANMAMMULA_100_121<tab>いえいえ……。
あなたのお役に立てたのならば幸いです。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_CATONANMAMMULA_000_121<tab>While I may never be able to adequately repay the kindness I have been shown, I must begin somewhere. Until we meet again.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_CATONANMAMMULA_000_121<tab>これで、安心してイシュガルドの暖房設備の事業に打ち込めます。
今後はこの街の人々のため、精一杯尽くす所存です。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_122<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, since I first met you, I knew you had the potential to become a gunbreaker. As the only one of my clan to escape the destruction of Bozja Citadel, I thought the art of the gunblade would die with me.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_122<tab>さて……<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>は、
私も及ばない、真のガンブレイカーとなった。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_123<tab>Now that I have passed on all I know to you, my successor, I feel that there is little for you to gain from taking on assignments with us.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_123<tab>祖国、シタデル・ボズヤは消滅し、我が一族も消えてしまったが、
ガンブレイカーの技は絶やすことなく、継承することができた。
ここらで、君を護衛稼業に巻き込むのも終わりにしよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SOPHIE_000_124<tab>Yes, we can hardly expect the Warrior of Light to spend valuable time assisting us with our money-making schemes.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SOPHIE_000_124<tab>アタシたちも、エオルゼアの土地勘がついたし、
ほかにも忙しそうなキミを、そろそろ解放してあげないとね。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_125<tab>Before we part ways, however, there is one last place I would like to visit with you. I hear that a great many adventurers who hope to make a name for themselves head to Revenant's Toll. I imagine there will be plenty to keep us busy.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_125<tab>だがその前に、君に頼みがある。
冒険者が集う、レヴナンツトールという街があると聞いた。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_126<tab>But more than anything, I am hoping to find others to whom I can impart the teachings of my clan. Once people see you with your gunblade strapped to your back, I'm sure it'll pique their curiosity. So, will you come with us?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_126<tab>そこで、君に代わるガンブレイカーの後継者を探し、
我らは護衛稼業を続けようと思う。
どうか、かの街へと案内してもらえないか？

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SOPHIE_000_128<tab>It seems like a funny location for a town, but it certainly is lively.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SOPHIE_000_128<tab>たくさんの冒険者たちが、行き交っているね。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_130<tab>I must confess, we would've struggled to find the place without you.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_130<tab>案内を、どうもありがとう。
この街で、私とソフィーは再出発することになる。
君ほどの逸材は、なかなかいないだろうが、気長に探してみるよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SOPHIE_100_130<tab>Yes, when I first heard about a remote settlement populated almost entirely by adventurers and the like, I was expecting it to be a lot more lawless and chaotic. Knife fights over card games, that sort of thing. What a pleasant surprise it turned out to be!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SOPHIE_100_130<tab>冒険者の街だったら、アタシたちのような余所者でも、
すぐに馴染めて、居心地もよさそうだね。
さっそく、いい店を見つけちゃった。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_131<tab>With a little luck, I'll find candidates to train as gunbreakers. Although it goes against the traditions of my clan to teach outsiders, meeting you has proved to me that we were being overly cautious.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_131<tab>最後に私から、ガンブレイカーの後継者となった君に、
伝えておきたいことがある。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_132<tab>You see, the gunblade is forged for one purpose: to protect. We feared that its techniques would fall into the hands of those who seek to oppress and conquer, such as the Garleans and the Allagans before them.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_132<tab>女王の護衛から発祥した我らの技は、あくまで人を護るためのもの。
決して、古代アラグ帝国や、ガレマール帝国のように、
人を支配し苦しめるような悪行には使われたくない。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_133<tab>Centuries of being beset by enemies on all sides taught us to fear and mistrust those not of our clan. That is why we kept our art such a closely guarded secret.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_133<tab>我が一族が長い間、ガンブレイカーの技を、
一族以外の者に授けなかったのも、それを恐れてのことだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_134<tab>But when you came to our rescue that day, you acted without a thought for your own safety to aid those in need. This is the true essence of the gunbreaker.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_134<tab>だが、私は君と初めて出会ったとき、
この者ならば、技を正しく使ってくれると直感した。
そして、ともに護衛稼業をすることで、それを確信できた。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_135<tab>You have your own ideals to protect, your own promises to keep. Go forth, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, and follow your path, wherever it may lead.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_RADOVAN_000_135<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、
真のガンブレイカーよ……
今後とも、その技で誰かを護ることに努めてくれ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SYSTEM_100_200<tab>In order to undertake the next gunbreaker quest, you must first meet the following requirements:
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SYSTEM_100_200<tab>「ガンブレイカー」の物語が、ひとつの区切りを迎えました！
次の「ガンブレイカー」のジョブクエストを開始するためには、
以下の条件を満たす必要があります。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SYSTEM_100_201<tab>※ You must have completed the main scenario quest “Shadowbringers.”
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SYSTEM_100_201<tab>1.「メインクエスト：漆黒のヴィランズ」の、
　「漆黒のヴィランズ」を完了する。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SYSTEM_100_202<tab>※ You must have completed the role quest “To Have Loved and Lost.”
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SYSTEM_100_202<tab>2.TANKロールの、
　「ロールクエスト」を完了する。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SYSTEM_100_203<tab>Once you have done so, the next gunbreaker quest will be available from Radovan.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB141_03266_SYSTEM_100_203<tab>条件を満たし、レヴナンツトールの「ラドヴァン」に話しかけ、
新たなジョブクエストを開始しましょう！
